allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Studio Dancers Administration System

- Student management with payment tracking
- Course and product management
- Cash register and sales
- Payment history and receipts
- Supabase integration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
UI Enhancement - Professional design system

- Added CSS variables for consistent color palette
- New gradient backgrounds and shadows
- Improved card, button, and form styles
- Added animations and transitions
- Modern scrollbar styling
- Better badge and alert components

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
